theorem with_seminorms.to_locally_convex_space {p : seminorm_family ùïú E Œπ} (hp : with_seminorms p) :
    locally_convex_space (expr‚Ñù) E :=

    rcases hs with ‚ü®I, r, hr, rfl‚ü©
    exact convex_ball _ _ _

t1_of_separating:
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Basic.lean:632:2: warning: expanding binder collection (x ¬´expr ‚â† ¬ª 0) -/
/- Note that through the following lemmas, one also immediately has that separating families
of seminorms induce T‚ÇÇ and T‚ÇÉ topologies by `topological_add_group.t2_space`
and `topological_add_group.t3_space` -/
/-- A separating family of seminorms induces a T‚ÇÅ topology. -/
theorem with_seminorms.t1_of_separating (hp : with_seminorms p) (h : ‚àÄ (x) (_ : x ‚â† 0), ‚àÉ i, p i x ‚â† 0) : t1_space E :=
  by
  haveI := hp.topological_add_group
  refine' topological_add_group.t1_space _ _
  rw [‚Üê is_open_compl_iff, hp.is_open_iff_mem_balls]
  rintro x (hx : x ‚â† 0)
  cases' h x hx with i pi_nonzero
  refine' ‚ü®{i}, p i x, by positivity, subset_compl_singleton_iff.mpr _‚ü©
  rw [finset.sup_singleton, mem_ball, zero_sub, map_neg_eq_map, not_lt]
#align with_seminorms.t1_of_separating with_seminorms.t1_of_separating
separating_of_t1:
/-- A family of seminorms inducing a T‚ÇÅ topology is separating. -/
theorem with_seminorms.separating_of_t1 [t1_space E] (hp : with_seminorms p) (x : E) (hx : x ‚â† 0) : ‚àÉ i, p i x ‚â† 0 :=
  by
  have := ((t1_space_tfae E).out 0 9).mp infer_instance
  by_contra' h
  refine' hx (this _)
  rw [hp.has_basis_zero_ball.specializes_iff]
  rintro ‚ü®s, r‚ü© (hr : 0 < r)
  simp only [ball_finset_sup_eq_Inter _ _ _ hr, mem_Inter‚ÇÇ, mem_ball_zero, h, hr, forall_true_iff]

/-- A family of seminorms is separating iff it induces a T‚ÇÅ topology. -/
theorem with_seminorms.separating_iff_t1 (hp : with_seminorms p) : (‚àÄ (x) (_ : x ‚â† 0), ‚àÉ i, p i x ‚â† 0) ‚Üî t1_space E :=

norm_with_seminorms:
/-- The topology of a `normed_space ùïú E` is induced by the seminorm `norm_seminorm ùïú E`. -/
theorem norm_with_seminorms (ùïú E) [normed_field ùïú] [seminormed_add_comm_group E] [normed_space ùïú E] :
    with_seminorms fun _ : fin 1 => norm_seminorm ùïú E :=
  by
  let p : seminorm_family ùïú E (fin 1) := fun _ => norm_seminorm ùïú E
  refine' ‚ü®seminormed_add_comm_group.to_topological_add_group.ext p.add_group_filter_basis.is_topological_add_group _‚ü©
  refine' filter.has_basis.eq_of_same_basis metric.nhds_basis_ball _
  rw [‚Üê ball_norm_seminorm ùïú E]
  refine'
    filter.has_basis.to_has_basis p.add_group_filter_basis.nhds_zero_has_basis _ fun r hr =>
      ‚ü®(norm_seminorm ùïú E).ball 0 r, p.basis_sets_singleton_mem 0 hr, rfl.subset‚ü©
  rintro U (hU : U ‚àà p.basis_sets)
  rcases p.basis_sets_iff.mp hU with ‚ü®s, r, hr, hU‚ü©
  use r, hr
  rw [hU, id.def]
  by_cases h : s.nonempty
  ¬∑ rw [finset.sup_const h]
  rw [finset.not_nonempty_iff_eq_empty.mp h, finset.sup_empty, ball_bot _ hr]
  exact Set.subset_univ _
#align norm_with_seminorms norm_with_seminorms
mem_nhds_iff:
/-- The `x`-neighbourhoods of a space whose topology is induced by a family of seminorms
are exactly the sets which contain seminorm balls around `x`.-/
theorem with_seminorms.mem_nhds_iff (hp : with_seminorms p) (x : E) (U : set E) :
    U ‚àà nhds x ‚Üî ‚àÉ s : Finset Œπ, ‚àÉ r > 0, (s.sup p).ball x r ‚äÜ U := by rw [hp.has_basis_ball.mem_iff, prod.exists]
#align with_seminorms.mem_nhds_iff with_seminorms.mem_nhds_iff
is_vonN_bounded_iff_seminorm_bounded:
theorem with_seminorms.is_vonN_bounded_iff_seminorm_bounded {s : set E} (hp : with_seminorms p) :
    bornology.is_vonN_bounded ùïú s ‚Üî ‚àÄ i : Œπ, ‚àÉ (r : _)(hr : 0 < r), ‚àÄ x ‚àà s, p i x < r :=
  by
  rw [hp.is_vonN_bounded_iff_finset_seminorm_bounded]
  constructor
  ¬∑ intro hI i
    convert hI {i}
    rw [finset.sup_singleton]
  intro hi I
  by_cases hI : I.nonempty
  ¬∑ choose r hr h using hi
    have h' : 0 < I.sup' hI r := by
      rcases hI.bex with ‚ü®i, hi‚ü©
      exact lt_of_lt_of_le (hr i) (finset.le_sup' r hi)
    refine' ‚ü®I.sup' hI r, h', fun x hx => finset_sup_apply_lt h' fun i hi => _‚ü©
    refine' lt_of_lt_of_le (h i x hx) _
    simp only [finset.le_sup'_iff, exists_prop]
    exact ‚ü®i, hi, (eq.refl _).le‚ü©
  simp only [finset.not_nonempty_iff_eq_empty.mp hI, finset.sup_empty, coe_bot, pi.zero_apply, exists_prop]
  exact ‚ü®1, zero_lt_one, fun _ _ => zero_lt_one‚ü©
#align with_seminorms.is_vonN_bounded_iff_seminorm_bounded with_seminorms.is_vonN_bounded_iff_seminorm_bounded
is_vonN_bounded_iff_finset_seminorm_boun:
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `¬´expr‚Äñ ‚Äñ¬ª -/
theorem with_seminorms.is_vonN_bounded_iff_finset_seminorm_bounded {s : set E} (hp : with_seminorms p) :
    bornology.is_vonN_bounded ùïú s ‚Üî ‚àÄ I : Finset Œπ, ‚àÉ (r : _)(hr : 0 < r), ‚àÄ x ‚àà s, I.sup p x < r :=
  by
  rw [hp.has_basis.is_vonN_bounded_basis_iff]
  constructor
  ¬∑ intro h I
    simp only [id.def] at h
    specialize h ((I.sup p).ball 0 1) (p.basis_sets_mem I zero_lt_one)
    rcases h with ‚ü®r, hr, h‚ü©
    cases' normed_field.exists_lt_norm ùïú r with a ha
    specialize h a (le_of_lt ha)
    rw [seminorm.smul_ball_zero (norm_pos_iff.1 <| hr.trans ha), mul_one] at h
    refine' ‚ü®¬´expr‚Äñ ‚Äñ¬ª a, lt_trans hr ha, _‚ü©
    intro x hx
    specialize h hx
    exact (finset.sup I p).mem_ball_zero.mp h
  intro h s' hs'
  rcases p.basis_sets_iff.mp hs' with ‚ü®I, r, hr, hs'‚ü©
  rw [id.def, hs']
  rcases h I with ‚ü®r', hr', h'‚ü©
  simp_rw [‚Üê (I.sup p).mem_ball_zero] at h'
  refine' absorbs.mono_right _ h'
  exact (finset.sup I p).ball_zero_absorbs_ball_zero hr
#align
  with_seminorms.is_vonN_bounded_iff_finset_seminorm_bounded with_seminorms.is_vonN_bounded_iff_finset_seminorm_bounded

/-- The open sets of a space whose topology is induced by a family of seminorms
are exactly the sets which contain seminorm balls around all of their points.-/
theorem with_seminorms.is_open_iff_mem_balls (hp : with_seminorms p) (U : set E) :
    is_open U ‚Üî ‚àÄ x ‚àà U, ‚àÉ s : Finset Œπ, ‚àÉ r > 0, (s.sup p).ball x r ‚äÜ U := by
  simp_rw [‚Üê with_seminorms.mem_nhds_iff hp _ U, is_open_iff_mem_nhds]
#align with_seminorms.is_open_iff_mem_balls with_seminorms.is_open_iff_mem_balls

/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `¬´expr ‚Ä¢ ¬ª -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `¬´expr ‚Ä¢ ¬ª -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `¬´expr ‚Üí‚Çõ‚Çó[ ] ¬ª -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `nnreal -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `¬´expr ‚Ä¢ ¬ª -/
theorem is_bounded_sup {p : Œπ ‚Üí seminorm ùïú E} {q : Œπ' ‚Üí seminorm ùïú‚ÇÇ F} {f : ¬´expr ‚Üí‚Çõ‚Çó[ ] ¬ª E œÉ‚ÇÅ‚ÇÇ F}
    (hf : is_bounded p q f) (s' : Finset Œπ') :
    ‚àÉ (C : nnreal)(s : Finset Œπ), 0 < C ‚àß (s'.sup q).comp f ‚â§ ¬´expr ‚Ä¢ ¬ª C (s.sup p) := by
  classical
    obtain rfl | hs' := s'.eq_empty_or_nonempty
    ¬∑ exact ‚ü®1, ‚àÖ, zero_lt_one, by simp [seminorm.bot_eq_zero]‚ü©
    choose f‚Çõ fC hf using hf
    use ¬´expr ‚Ä¢ ¬ª s'.card (s'.sup fC), Finset.bunion·µ¢ s' f‚Çõ
    constructor
    ¬∑ refine' nsmul_pos _ (ne_of_gt (finset.nonempty.card_pos hs'))
      cases' Finset.Nonempty.bex hs' with j hj
      exact lt_of_lt_of_le (zero_lt_iff.mpr (And.left (hf j))) (finset.le_sup hj)
    have hs : ‚àÄ i : Œπ', i ‚àà s' ‚Üí (q i).comp f ‚â§ ¬´expr ‚Ä¢ ¬ª (s'.sup fC) ((Finset.bunion·µ¢ s' f‚Çõ).sup p) :=
      by
      intro i hi
      refine' le_trans (And.right (hf i)) (smul_le_smul _ (finset.le_sup hi))
      exact finset.sup_mono (Finset.subset_bunion·µ¢_of_mem f‚Çõ hi)
    refine' le_trans (comp_mono f (finset_sup_le_sum q s')) _
    simp_rw [‚Üê pullback_apply, add_monoid_hom.map_sum, pullback_apply]
    refine' le_trans (finset.sum_le_sum hs) _
    rw [finset.sum_const, smul_assoc]
    exact le_rfl
#align is_bounded_sup is_bounded_sup

/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `nhds -/

theorem with_seminorms.has_basis_ball (hp : with_seminorms p) {x : E} :
    ((nhds) (x : E)).has_basis (fun sr : Finset Œπ √ó expr‚Ñù => 0 < sr.2) fun sr => (sr.1.sup p).ball x sr.2 :=
  by
  haveI : topological_add_group E := hp.topological_add_group

    eq.symm (seminorm.vadd_ball (sr.fst.sup p))
  rwa [vadd_eq_add, add_zero] at this

theorem with_seminorms.has_basis (hp : with_seminorms p) :
    ((nhds) (0 : E)).has_basis (fun s : set E => s ‚àà p.basis_sets) id :=
  by

first_countable:
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `nhds -/
/-- If the topology of a space is induced by a countable family of seminorms, then the topology
is first countable. -/
theorem with_seminorms.first_countable (hp : with_seminorms p) : topological_space.first_countable_topology E :=
  by
  have : ((nhds) (0 : E)).is_countably_generated :=
    by
    rw [p.with_seminorms_iff_nhds_eq_infi.mp hp]
    exact filter.infi.is_countably_generated _
  haveI : (uniformity E).is_countably_generated := uniform_add_group.uniformity_countably_generated
  exact uniform_space.first_countable_topology E
#align with_seminorms.first_countable with_seminorms.first_countable

    (s.sup q).comp f = s.sup (q.comp f) := by

/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `¬´expr‚®Ö , ¬ª -/

/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `nhds -/
theorem filter_eq_infi (p : seminorm_family ùïú E Œπ) :
    p.module_filter_basis.to_filter_basis.filter =
      ¬´expr‚®Ö , ¬ª "./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:210:13: unsupported notation `¬´expr‚®Ö , ¬ª"
        (((nhds) 0).comap (p i)) :=

  ¬∑ rw [p.module_filter_basis.to_filter_basis.has_basis.le_basis_iff (metric.nhds_basis_ball.comap _)]
    intro Œµ hŒµ
    refine' ‚ü®(p i).ball 0 Œµ, _, _‚ü©
    ¬∑ rw [‚Üê (finset.sup_singleton : _ = p i)]
      exact p.basis_sets_mem {i} hŒµ
    ¬∑ rw [id, (p i).ball_zero_eq_preimage_ball]
  ¬∑ rw [p.module_filter_basis.to_filter_basis.has_basis.ge_iff]
    rintro U (hU : U ‚àà p.basis_sets)

    rw [id, seminorm.ball_finset_sup_eq_Inter _ _ _ hr, s.Inter_mem_sets]

      filter.mem_infi_of_mem i

theorem with_seminorms.continuous_seminorm [nontrivially_normed_field ùïù] [Module ùïù E] [has_continuous_const_smul ùïù E]
    {p : seminorm_family ùïù E Œπ} (hp : with_seminorms p) (i : Œπ) : continuous (p i) :=
  by
  refine' seminorm.continuous one_pos _
  rw [p.with_seminorms_iff_nhds_eq_infi.mp hp, ball_zero_eq_preimage_ball]
  exact filter.mem_infi_of_mem i (filter.preimage_mem_comap <| metric.ball_mem_nhds _ one_pos)

/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `¬´expr ‚Üí‚Çõ‚Çó[ ] ¬ª -/
theorem continuous_of_continuous_comp {q : seminorm_family ùïù‚ÇÇ F Œπ'} [topological_space E] [topological_add_group E]
    [topological_space F] [topological_add_group F] (hq : with_seminorms q) (f : ¬´expr ‚Üí‚Çõ‚Çó[ ] ¬ª E œÑ‚ÇÅ‚ÇÇ F)
    (hf : ‚àÄ i, continuous ((q i).comp f)) : continuous f :=
  by
  refine' continuous_of_continuous_at_zero f _
  simp_rw [continuous_at, f.map_zero, q.with_seminorms_iff_nhds_eq_infi.mp hq, filter.tendsto_infi,
    filter.tendsto_comap_iff]
  intro i
  convert (hf i).continuous_at
  exact (map_zero _).symm

/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `¬´expr ‚Üí‚Çõ‚Çó[ ] ¬ª -/
theorem continuous_iff_continuous_comp {q : seminorm_family ùïú‚ÇÇ F Œπ'} [topological_space E] [topological_add_group E]
    [topological_space F] [topological_add_group F] [has_continuous_const_smul ùïú‚ÇÇ F] (hq : with_seminorms q)
    (f : ¬´expr ‚Üí‚Çõ‚Çó[ ] ¬ª E œÉ‚ÇÅ‚ÇÇ F) : continuous f ‚Üî ‚àÄ i, continuous ((q i).comp f) :=
  ‚ü®fun h i => continuous.comp (hq.continuous_seminorm i) h, continuous_of_continuous_comp hq f‚ü©

continuous_from_bounded:
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `¬´expr ‚Üí‚Çõ‚Çó[ ] ¬ª -/
theorem continuous_from_bounded {p : seminorm_family ùïù E Œπ} {q : seminorm_family ùïù‚ÇÇ F Œπ'} [topological_space E]
    [topological_add_group E] (hp : with_seminorms p) [topological_space F] [topological_add_group F]
    (hq : with_seminorms q) (f : ¬´expr ‚Üí‚Çõ‚Çó[ ] ¬ª E œÑ‚ÇÅ‚ÇÇ F) (hf : seminorm.is_bounded p q f) : continuous f :=
  by
  refine' continuous_of_continuous_comp hq _ fun i => seminorm.continuous_of_continuous_at_zero _
  rw [metric.continuous_at_iff', map_zero]
  intro r hr
  rcases hf i with ‚ü®s‚ÇÅ, C, hC, hf‚ü©
  have hC' : 0 < C := hC.bot_lt
  rw [hp.has_basis.eventually_iff]
  refine' ‚ü®(s‚ÇÅ.sup p).ball 0 (r / C), p.basis_sets_mem _ (by positivity), _‚ü©
  simp_rw [‚Üê metric.mem_ball, ‚Üê mem_preimage, ‚Üê ball_zero_eq_preimage_ball]
  refine' subset.trans _ (ball_antitone hf)
  rw [ball_smul (s‚ÇÅ.sup p) hC']
  rfl

/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `nnreal -/

theorem const_is_bounded (Œπ : Type _) [nonempty Œπ] {p : seminorm ùïú E} {q : Œπ' ‚Üí seminorm ùïú‚ÇÇ F}
    (f : ¬´expr ‚Üí‚Çõ‚Çó[ ] ¬ª E œÉ‚ÇÅ‚ÇÇ F) :
    is_bounded (fun _ : Œπ => p) q f ‚Üî ‚àÄ i, ‚àÉ C : nnreal, C ‚â† 0 ‚àß (q i).comp f ‚â§ ¬´expr ‚Ä¢ ¬ª C p :=

/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `¬´expr‚àÄ·∂† in , ¬ª -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:210:13: unsupported notation `¬´expr‚àÄ·∂† in , ¬ª -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `nhds -/

theorem basis_sets_smul_right (v : E) (U : set E) (hU : U ‚àà p.basis_sets) :
    ¬´expr‚àÄ·∂† in , ¬ª "./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:210:13: unsupported notation `¬´expr‚àÄ·∂† in , ¬ª" ((nhds) 0)

    exact metric.ball_mem_nhds 0 (div_pos hr h)
  simp_rw [le_antisymm (not_lt.mp h) (map_nonneg _ v), mul_zero, hr]

    ‚àÉ (V : set E)(H : V ‚àà p.add_group_filter_basis.sets), V ‚äÜ ¬´expr ‚Åª¬π' ¬ª (fun y : E => ¬´expr ‚Ä¢ ¬ª x y) U :=

theorem basis_sets_smul (U) (hU : U ‚àà p.basis_sets) :
    ‚àÉ (V : set ùïú)(H : V ‚àà (nhds) (0 : ùïú))(W : set E)(H : W ‚àà p.add_group_filter_basis.sets), ¬´expr ‚Ä¢ ¬ª V W ‚äÜ U :=

  (basis_sets_iff _).mpr ‚ü®i, _, hr, rfl‚ü©

theorem basis_sets_intersect (U V : set E) (hU : U ‚àà p.basis_sets) (hV : V ‚àà p.basis_sets) :
    ‚àÉ (z : set E)(H : z ‚àà p.basis_sets), z ‚äÜ U ‚à© V := by
  classical
    rcases p.basis_sets_iff.mp hU with ‚ü®s, r‚ÇÅ, hr‚ÇÅ, hU‚ü©
    rcases p.basis_sets_iff.mp hV with ‚ü®t, r‚ÇÇ, hr‚ÇÇ, hV‚ü©
    use ((s ‚à™ t).sup p).ball 0 (min r‚ÇÅ r‚ÇÇ)
    refine' ‚ü®p.basis_sets_mem (s ‚à™ t) (lt_min_iff.mpr ‚ü®hr‚ÇÅ, hr‚ÇÇ‚ü©), _‚ü©
    rw [hU, hV, ball_finset_sup_eq_Inter _ _ _ (lt_min_iff.mpr ‚ü®hr‚ÇÅ, hr‚ÇÇ‚ü©), ball_finset_sup_eq_Inter _ _ _ hr‚ÇÅ,
      ball_finset_sup_eq_Inter _ _ _ hr‚ÇÇ]
    exact
      Set.subset_inter
        (Set.inter·µ¢‚ÇÇ_mono' fun i hi => ‚ü®i, Finset.subset_union_left _ _ hi, ball_mono <| min_le_left _ _‚ü©)
        (Set.inter·µ¢‚ÇÇ_mono' fun i hi => ‚ü®i, Finset.subset_union_right _ _ hi, ball_mono <| min_le_right _ _‚ü©)
#align basis_sets_intersect basis_sets_intersect

theorem basis_sets_iff {U : set E} : U ‚àà p.basis_sets ‚Üî ‚àÉ (i : Finset Œπ)(r : _)(hr : 0 < r), U = ball (i.sup p) 0 r :=
  by simp only [basis_sets, mem_Union, mem_singleton_iff]
#align basis_sets_iff basis_sets_iff
basis_sets_add:
theorem basis_sets_add (U) (hU : U ‚àà p.basis_sets) : ‚àÉ (V : set E)(H : V ‚àà p.basis_sets), V + V ‚äÜ U :=
  by
  rcases p.basis_sets_iff.mp hU with ‚ü®s, r, hr, hU‚ü©
  use (s.sup p).ball 0 (r / 2)
  refine' ‚ü®p.basis_sets_mem s (div_pos hr zero_lt_two), _‚ü©
  refine' Set.Subset.trans (ball_add_ball_subset (s.sup p) (r / 2) (r / 2) 0 0) _
  rw [hU, add_zero, add_halves']
#align basis_sets_add basis_sets_add
